name: Worms Love Donuts
description: Worms Love Donuts is a simple game reminiscent of classics such as Snake, Nibbles, and even the MS-DOS underground hit known as Pizza Worm.  You control a worm who eats donuts and grows larger and larger, and the object is to avoid running into the outer wall or your own body.  Perfect for kids of all ages.  Features include a simple and attractive user interface and game presentation, cute sound effects and '80s techno music soundtrack (can be disabled), and high score tracking.
